channel.title: GamersTips Mod Area
channel.description:
I made Mod area in my 2.0 server im making. Im still adding to it, but this is what i have so far.
when you use the viewing orbs, it teleports you to the party room, and theres monsters you kill. They drop Cwar tickets, and if you get 1,000, you get a party hat.
[URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/3/1/27/f_showoffm_b88fa53.png&srv=img19][IMG]http://img19.picoodle.com/img/img19/3/1/27/f_showoffm_b88fa53.png[/img][/URL]
Tell me how you guys like it.

item.title: GamersTips Mod Area
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:10, topic:258913”][quote author=~Co.NR~ link=topic=341889.msg2649814#msg2649814 date=1233464720]
Hes just showing off what he has made so far i’m guessing.

Your guessing in a forum that is for server development.

[/quote]By saying this you made no point whatsoever. I have no idea what you’re trying to get across here. If you’re trying to say his guess is obvious, then just leave it be.

~Ontopic

It’s kind of awkward to have a mod area… that requires a mini-game. Isn’t modship enough of a requirement? Either way, i suppose it’s creative. KuDoS.[/quote]

Thank you Reaper

On topic- good luck with this.

Read full topic
